steps.intention: Identify objects with preference > 90% in any category
steps.note: Check each object's preference percentages across categories.

steps.intention: Count objects meeting the preference threshold
steps.code: preferences = [{'A': 95, 'B': 85, 'C': 90}, {'A': 88, 'B': 92, 'C': 91}, {'A': 89, 'B': 87, 'C': 93}]; count = sum(1 for obj in preferences if any(p > 90 for p in obj.values()))
